pages.text: us jannath ki sifath, jis ka waada parhezgaro ko diya gaya hai, ye hai ke us ke neeche se nehre beh rahi hai, us ka mewa hameshgi wala hai aur us ka saAya bhi, ye hai anjaam parhezgaaro ka aur kaafiro ka anjaame kaar dozakh hai

jinhe hum ne kitaab di hai wo to jo kuch aap par utara jata hai us se khush hote hai aur dosre firqe us ki baaz batho ke munkir hai, aap elaan kar dijiye ke mujhe to sirf yahi hukm diya gaya hai ke main Allah ki ibadath karo aur us ke saath shareek na karo, main osi ki taraf bula raha hoon aur osi ki jaanib mera lautna hai

isi tarah hum ne is Qurâ€™an ko arabi zabaan ka farmaan utara hai, agar aap ne un ki qwaahisho ki pairvi karli, us ke baad ke aap ke paas ilm aa chuka hai to Allah (ke azaabo) se aap ko koi himaayati milega aur na bachaane wala

hum aap se pehle bhi bahuth se rasool bhej chuke hai, hum ne un sab ko biwi baccho wala banaya tha, kisi rasool se nahi ho sakta ke koi nishaani baghair Allah ki ijaazath ke le aaye, har muqarrara waade ki ek liqath hai
Allah jo chaahe mitaade aur jo chahe saabith rakhe, lohe mehfooz osi ke paas hai
un se kiye hoye waado mein se koi agar hum aap ko dikhaade ya aap ko hum fauth karle to aap par to sirf pahoncha dena hee hai, hisaab to hamare zimme hee hai
kya wo nahi dekhte? ke hum zameen ko us ke kinaaro se ghataate chale aa rahe hai, Allah hukm karta hai, koi us ke ehkaam piche daalne wala nahi, wo jald hisaab lene wala hai

un se pehle logo ne bhi apni makkari mein kami na ki thi, lekin tamaam tadbire Allah hee ki hai, jo shaqs jo kuch kar raha hai Allah ke ilm mein hai, kaafiro ko abhi maalom ho jayega ke (us) jahaan ki jaza kis ke liye hai
